title: TimHarrington
author: TimHarrington
content: Hi, Im New to forum but not mining in alot of telegram groups etc we have for sale alot of broken faulty miners inventory below140 x S17 PRO80 x S19 110th14 x S19 141 XPall miners have had 0 attempt of repair and no burn marks Contact info Telegram : @TimHarrington1

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Sell it on ebay for part maybe would be dozen of user gonna look for it

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: Hi OP,Where are you located? I mean, where will the ASICs be shipped from?Are you willing to go through a reputable forum escrow? We could go through willi9974 if you are ok with that.If so, we could agree on a batch.But I refuse to do a deal on Telegram, you have no reputation here, we don't know you and for the moment we have no guarantee regarding your honesty.

comments.author: TimHarrington
comments.body: I'm Happy to use a reputable escrow here
